notifyChange().Description: Notifies listeners that all properties of this instance have changed.

Parameters: int: The generated BR id for the Bindable field.
notifyPropertyChanged(int).Description: Notifies listeners that a specific property has changed. The getter for the property that changes should be marked with @B_android#databinding#Bindable_E@ to generate a field in BR to be used as fieldId.

ClassDesc: A convenience class that implements @B_android#databinding#Observable_E@ interface and provides @B_android#databinding#BaseObservable#notifyPropertyChanged_E@ and @B_android#databinding#BaseObservable#notifyChange_E@ methods.
